title: 1333 - AGENDA (English) - G7 Finance Ministers and Central Bank Governors meeting July 17-18, 2019
text:
G7 Finance Ministers and Central Bank Governors meeting 
July 17-18, 2019 
Draft agenda 
 
Wednesday, July 17th 
 
12:30 - 14:30 
(Working 
lunch) 
Sequence 1. Addressing risks in the global economy and the financial 
system 
12:30 – 13:30. Global economy 
            13:30 – 14:30. Cybersecurity in the financial sector and stable coins 
14:45 - 17:45 
Sequence 2. Addressing new challenges 
14:45 – 16:30. International taxation 
16:30 – 17:45. Competition and the digital economy 
 
 
 
20:00 - 21:30 
Working dinner on international cooperation 
 
Thursday, July 18th 
 
8:00 - 9:00 
Working breakfast on climate / green finance  
 
 
9:15 - 11:15 
Sequence 3. Fighting inequalities between and within countries 
9:15 – 10:15. Inequalities within advanced economies 
10:15 – 11:15. Development agenda, with Melinda Gates (Bill & Melinda 
Gates Foundation) 
 
11:15 - 12:30 
Session with stakeholders on gender equality in business and the economy 
 
For information: 

 
 
- 
The traditional press conference which closes the G7 with both the Governor and the 
Minister will take place on Thursday 18th July at 11:15 am (exact timing TBC). 
- 
The family photo is scheduled on Wednesday 17th July at 19:30 pm (this could change 
depending on the weather). 
- 
We will also hold a background debrief on Wednesday 17th July once the sessions have 
finished. We will announce the precise details in the dedicated press centre on the day. 
- 
We will hold a technical briefing in advance of the G7 on Friday 12th July at Bercy with 
the Banque de France and the Gates Foundation at 11:15 am. The Minister, Bruno Le 
Maire, will participate.
